long_description: The women-specific design of the Stohlquist Flo PFD is a great choice when looking for a compatible fit with seat backs found in many sit-on-top and recreational kayaks. Contoured inner cups wrap around body without uncomfortable pressure. Durable high-denier ripstop shell stands up to the tough love of paddling. Open sides enhance ventilation, and mesh shoulders and back enhance comfort. Cross-chest cinch strap design eliminates annoying ride up, and padded neoprene waistband enhances comfort. 1.5 in. webbing belt, shoulder webbing and side webbing easily adjust to create a low-profile fit. You can take small extras along thanks to self-draining pockets that expand to store accessories or even a beverage. Center-zip design with noncorroding zipper allows easy entry. 4-way lash tabs on front and back let you secure accessories such as strobes or knives (not included). Short length of the Stohlquist Flo PFD won't interfere with seat backs.
short_description: The women-specific design of the Stohlquist Flo PFD is a great choice when looking for a compatible fit with seat backs found in many sit-on-top and recreational kayaks.
